BackstoryDef.title: Wraith child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From their first breath, [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed in the cold corridors of a hive ship. Lessons included ambush tactics, sarcasm, and how to drain life energy without spilling too much. Playtime was... intense.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive spawnling
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Bred in biomass vats and bathed in bioluminescence, [PAWN_nameDef] was just one of many spawnlings nurtured by the hive. Lessons were swift and brutal—play-fights ended in broken limbs, and lullabies were sung in sonar pings. Childhood? More like “pre-mission prep.”

BackstoryDef.title: Feeding apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While most Wraith young were taught how to fight, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to monitor prisoners and "observe feeding behavior." They quickly learned that not screaming too much earned praise—and sometimes, leftovers.

BackstoryDef.title: Hatchling scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Before they could fully pronounce "subjugation," [PAWN_nameDef] was sneaking through forest undergrowth on recon missions. They learned to be quiet, quick, and terrifyingly efficient at spotting humans from 300 meters in the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive chorale
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised to “sing” the hive’s psionic resonance, [PAWN_nameDef] spent their youth humming alien chords in endless chambers. The melodies sharpened focus, tuned instincts, and occasionally drove weaker spawnlings insane.

BackstoryDef.title: Bone forager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Before learning the elegance of feeding, [PAWN_nameDef] scoured husks for marrow and chitin. Every cracked rib was a lesson in anatomy and every discarded corpse, a practice subject.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive jester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Some spawnlings survived not by strength, but by entertaining their brood with cruel games. [PAWN_nameDef] learned wit as sharp as claws, distracting stronger peers from tearing them apart.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith queen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Hive Queen—ruler, strategist, and fashion icon of the Wraith empire. They command with elegance, cruelty, and a voice that can flay egos at fifty paces. Their hive is their kingdom, and everyone else is just takeout.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned their rank through cunning, combat, and impressive hair. As second-in-command to a Hive Queen, they manage logistics, motivate troops, and occasionally remind subordinates not to eat each other without permission.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lives for the hunt. As a warrior caste member, they specialize in ambushes, close-quarters brutality, and deeply unsettling stares. Thinking is optional—fighting is not.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive geneticist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Not every Wraith solves problems with claws. [PAWN_nameDef] manipulated DNA strands like others swing plasma rifles—perfecting mutations, suppressing rebellion traits, and occasionally experimenting on themselves... for science, of course.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive interrogator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While some Wraith feed for sustenance, [PAWN_nameDef] fed for information. With a scalpel in one hand and psychic intimidation in the other, they extracted secrets like marrow from bone—slowly, and with flair.

BackstoryDef.title: Broodmaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In charge of a particularly volatile clutch of warriors, [PAWN_nameDef] balanced discipline, feeding schedules, and ritualistic hive chants. Commanding subordinates who occasionally tried to eat each other built patience—and incredible lung power.

BackstoryDef.title: Voidcaller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every hive has its mystic oddball. [PAWN_nameDef] claimed to “hear the will of the hive through the stars,” performed rituals before hunts, and once convinced a cruiser pilot to detour for a psychic anomaly. Strangely, they were rarely wrong.

BackstoryDef.title: Shadowblade
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained to strike unseen, [PAWN_nameDef] blended stealth with precision feeding. Entire villages vanished overnight without alarm—only a faint shimmer in the air betrayed their passing.

BackstoryDef.title: Biomancer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Experimenting with hive biomass vats, [PAWN_nameDef] reshaped flesh like clay. Some creations thrived, others screamed until they dissolved, but each experiment deepened their mastery.

BackstoryDef.title: Soul harrower
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Where others feasted quickly, [PAWN_nameDef] prolonged the process—torturing prey with psychic echoes while draining them. Victims were left hollow, their last moments stretched into eternity.

BackstoryDef.title: Hive strategist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a tactical advisor, moving warriors like pieces on a living board. Cold logic and ruthless calculation turned battlefields into banquets.
